snippet: Jamie Gray won the gold medal and set two records in women’s 50-meter three-position rifle shooting; Lithuanian basketball fans were warned about racist behavior; demonstrators protested a Syrian equestrian rider.
abstract: Olympics Roundup; United States women's 4x100-meter medley relay team--swimmers Missy Franklin, Rebecca Soni, Dana Vollmer and Allison Schmitt--win gold; other results and news noted.
lead_paragraph: Jamie Gray won the gold medal and set two records in women’s 50-meter three-position rifle shooting; Lithuanian basketball fans were warned about racist behavior; demonstrators protested a Syrian equestrian rider.

headline.main: U.S. Shooter Wins Gold, Setting Olympic Records
headline.print_headline: U.S. Women Set Mark in Medley Relay
